content:
Add devcontainer
  Create new hugo site: hugo new site blog
  Try to create new hugo module https://docs.stack.jimmycai.com/getting-started hugo mod init github.com/achingono/achingono.github.io Error: failed to init modules: binary with name “go” not found
  Add go binary to devcontainer docker file
  Check go version >go version go version go1.18 linux/amd64
  Turn new site into a Hugo module: >hugo mod init github.com/achingono/achingono.github.io go: creating new go.mod: module github.com/achingono/achingono.github.io go: to add module requirements and sums: go mod tidy
  Declare the hugo-theme-stack module as a dependency of your site: >hugo mod get github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack/v3 go: downloading github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack/v3 v3.10.0 go: downloading github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack v2.6.0+incompatible go: added github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack/v3 v3.10.0
  wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack/master/exampleSite/config.yaml
title: My first post
